title: An Unnamed Lock Screen
description: A WIP attempt to make a gpu-accelerated lockscreen for wlroots based wayland compositors which can render images, gifs, shaders with support for filters such as blur.

title: IESCP
description: A platform to connect Sponsors and Influencers so that sponsors can get their product/service advertised and influencers can get monetary benefit.

title: Kernel
description: A simple bootloader for x86_64 systems which boots into 32-bit protected mode and enters a kernel written in rust with support for framebuffers.

title: Shell
description: A shell with very very basic capabilities

title: Program Dependence Graph
description: Design a compiler pass (LLVM) to take a C++ application as input, generate the program dependence graph.
